name: repl-chat
description: Interactive REPL interface with AI integration using Babashka nREPL

scripts.test: NODE_OPTIONS='--no-warnings' node --test --test-reporter=spec --test-timeout=60000 test/repl-loop.test.js test/db-history.test.js test/html-extraction.test.js test/log-capture.test.js test/clojure-discovery.test.js test/observability.test.js test/code-mode-integration.test.js

author: Robert Krahn
